attributes.action: UK and Britain is not a Country
attributes.additional_details:
It is time e petition and government departments including local government allowed us to submit the country we are born or live in. On line forms and hard copy, Forms etc often make us choose Britain or UK these are not a country. I am English and I live in England. If I was Pakistani or Indian I can register as such, Government department do not simply have Asia listed or Middle East.
It is time to acknowledge England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland. We have a right to put our Nationality down correctly not just fit the Governments Box.
